CVE-2018-15919.summary: Remotely observable behaviour in auth-gss2.c in OpenSSH through 7.8 could be used by remote attackers to detect existence of users on a target system when GSS2 is in use. NOTE: the discoverer states 'We understand that the OpenSSH developers do not want to treat such a username enumeration (or "oracle") as a vulnerability.'

CVE-2017-15906.summary: The process_open function in sftp-server.c in OpenSSH before 7.6 does not properly prevent write operations in readonly mode, which allows attackers to create zero-length files.

			<div style="background-color: #00000099; border-radius: 3px; border: solid 2px; border-color: #555555dd; padding: 12px; margin: 4px;">
<p style="text-align: left; color: #ffffff; font-weight: bold;">The goal of the Professional & Amateur Pinball Association is to create and promote the world’s greatest pinball tournaments, encourage friendly competition, and spread enthusiasm for pinball among casual gamers. Toward that end, we have built <a href="https://papa.org/competitions/pinburgh/pinburgh-2018/">Pinburgh –</a> <a href="https://www.ebay.com">Presented by eBay,</a> the largest pinball tournament in history, worked alongside <a href="http://ifpapinball.com/">IFPA</a> and <a href="http://sternpinball.com/">Stern Pinball</a> to create the Stern Pro Circuit, and have begun regularly broadcasting pinball-related coverage with the creation of our instructional tutorials, competition videos, and PAPAtv live streaming series.</p>
<p style="text-align: left; color: #ffffff; font-weight: bold;">Our hope is that pinball players will use the resources our organization provides to become both more successful and more interested in the wonderful game of pinball.</p>
</div>
